channel.title: CVE Feed for Feather js -- Feathers-Sequalize
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Feather js -- Feathers-Sequalize

item.title: CVE-2022-2422|2024-08-03T00:39:07.281Z -- feather%20js -- feathers-sequalize
item.description: Due to improper input validation in the Feathers js library, it is possible to perform a SQL injection attack on the back-end database, in case the feathers-sequelize package is used.

item.title: CVE-2022-29823|2024-08-03T06:33:42.743Z -- feather%20js -- feathers-sequalize
item.description: Feather-Sequalize cleanQuery method uses insecure recursive logic to filter unsupported keys from the query object. This results in a Remote Code Execution (RCE) with privileges of application.

item.title: CVE-2022-29822|2024-08-03T06:33:42.585Z -- feather%20js -- feathers-sequalize
item.description: Due to improper parameter filtering in the Feathers js library, which may ultimately lead to SQL injection
